title: RioBlemz
author: RioBlemz
content: Hello,Have you experienced frustration before? how did you deal with it?I have been really wondering if the feeling of frustration is part of life or is just somebody invoking it on oneself.Few things I know about frustration is that it is a feeling of unpleasantness which can lead to depression and can deteriorate to committing suicide. But I cannot really itemize where the feeling itself comes from or when it starts.In my own thoughts I don't think the feeling of frustration is good for human activities.I welcome your opinion on this subject and you can include ways by which we can maintain a sound mind.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well I do not deal with frustration as much as I have to when I was young. But I must agree with you that frustration is not a good feeling. And we do not want to have to live like this. But when I am getting this feeling there is some things that I like to do for making it feel better.Going for a walk, reading a good book, and meditation are all things that help with my frustration. These things can help with my mood, agitation, and just if am I having a bad time.

comments.author: bitterguy28
comments.body: Expect  nothing so you will never be frustrated mate.

comments.author: Pingrapole
comments.body: One thing I have noticed is that in this forum we use the word disappointed because we are disappointed in everything, but eventually we succeed.Of course all people feel disappointment but to deal with it, you have to make up your mind first and decide well what you want to do first then you won't be disappointed.Look at those who have good identity and see how they have overcome depression and come so far, then depression will disappear inside you.

comments.author: RioBlemz
comments.body: Quote from: bitterguy28 on September 17, 2023, 02:45:52 PMExpect  nothing so you will never be frustrated mate.This is a hard saying but it is true. Once there is no established expectation then there won't be frustration. The only thing I had to say is that it is seemly impossible going through life without expectation from family, persons  etc.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: I stop with what I do whenever I get frustrated. Why? Because it will stop me as well for being productive with the work or anything that I do. That's how I deal with it and taking some deep breath and fresh air really helps and having a conversation with someone that you have the same interest also helps. Drinking some fresh or cold drink do help as well while eating some fruits that have juices is also a good way to deal with it. In short, anything that you are comfortable doing must be done for you to tackle against frustration. Don't dwell on it for too long because it is temporary.

comments.author: Ravichnadra
comments.body: Well of course ~ Frustration is a common emotion that everyone experiences at some point. It can stem from various sources such as unmet expectations, feeling stuck in a situation, or facing obstacles despite efforts. It's a part of life, but how we manage and respond to it can significantly impact our well-being.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: No matter what you're facing in life, never pray to be frustrated as frustration can lead to taking unpleasant decisions that might affect you in life. I remember a time when I had a severe accident that I spent all my money in the hospital treating myself, my business went down no source of livelihood as it took me some time to recover fully and get back to my feet, I ran into series of debt just to make sure i got back to my fit and as soon as i recovered though not fully, all the people i was owing were on my neck coupled with some other bills and i was looking for a way out, it was just as if i should dig a pit and fall inside due to the level of frustration i was facing, like someone who was doing fine alright all of a sudden just go broke it's really a very sad experience and I don't wish anybody to be frustrated.

comments.author: Captain50
comments.body: To move our life forward we have to be free from disappointment the more disappointment you have in your life the more backward you are in your life we ​​have to make our life in such a way that there is no disappointment in our life then our life will be very beautiful in future times
